question: Identify the Volleyball attack technique. "It refers to whether the ball flies in a straight trajectory parallel to the sidelines, or crosses through the court in an angle resulting in the ball landing near the 3-meter line."?
explanation: Line and Cross-court Shot refers to whether the ball flies in a straight trajectory parallel to the sidelines, or crosses through the court in an angle. A cross-court shot with a very pronounced angle, resulting in the ball landing near the 3-meter line, is called a cut shot.
